name: Timesheets Please - Job Simulator
description:
Timesheets Please is a Job Simulator game made for the Jamulator 2021 game Jam where a simulation game was required for entry.

I created the game to simulate the job of a Timesheets Manager or the person who needs to keep track of how much time workers invest in a project so that, in some cases, a client could be billed for those hours.

Here you will take the role of such a person and see how amazing it is to keep asking people to enter them on time for a week.  The game is short and could be finished in just a few minutes.

To play, look for blue links inside the channel's text and hit the message at the bottom to send it inside an appropriate chat. You have 30 seconds per day to go through the reports, but sometimes if you take your time with some people, in particular, you might get them to calm down and help you do your job.

The ending message depends on how people reacted to your chats.

The only assets used for the game were the free ones below:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/fruitface-animated-ui-pack-58...
https://github.com/iamcal/emoji-data
